name: La Familia
text: Love the customization options, including what style crust you can make.  Our family is diverse and this satisfies all of us. Staff is always upbeat and very helpful. I even downloaded the app at their recommendation and already earned a free salad. Place is clean. Food is good. Thumbs up!

name: Prasanna Yabaluri
text: New location. Awesome pizza with quality ingredients. Super friendly staff. I wish they improve cauliflower base. As you see it looks good but it tasted like cardboard. üòî Unlike regular crust which is soft before they bake it the cauliflower Crust is prebaked so double baking makes it card board. I will stick to regular crust.

name: Stephen Walker
text: This place is great! Clean, quick, and delicious! The service is fantastic and everyone I've dealt with here is kind and professional! Highly recommend stopping in on your lunch hour or with the family!

name: Ali A
text:
Good quality,  lots of choices for topping,  not that much expensive. Fast service.
This location has enough parking space, ‚Ä¶More

name: Shades
text: This is the best pizza restaurant I have been to ever!  From the moment you enter, you are welcomed! It has a amazing atmosphere, very clean, very fast, very good. Let me show you what I ordered today. ‚Ä¶More

text: I really like this place, their customer service and the taste of the pizza of course üòã. I used to eat sandwiches from subway but after my husband and I ordered from mod pizza for the first time, now we can‚Äôt order except from them. I absolutely would recommend this place for you guys

text: MOD PIZZA is the best thing since sliced cheese. I always look forward to indulging in creating my own pizza here every weekend.  At this point it really is a ritual for me.  I couldn't be any more grateful that this location is closer to ‚Ä¶More

name: Trevor caton
text: I was recommended this place based on the fact that you can add any number of toppings for the same price. That was a huge plus. Unfortunately the pizza was some of the most disappointing pizza I‚Äôve ever paid for. Scant toppings, cold, and ‚Ä¶More

name: Krissy Billings
text: Guy was singing Cotton Eyed Joe and they spelled my name correctly. Also, my food was good. Apparently you can add whatever you want to your pizza which is super nice. All the sauces I've tried have been delicious.

name: carson clark
text: Be aware... Ordered door dash tonight paid$7 for a salad... Which was about 3 bites... No fork...had to eat it with my fingers...pizza cold...could have been drivers fault.... Won't be ordering from them again.

name: Rebekah Lenington
text: Love mod pizza! Always a great experience!

name: RideShareShawn
text: Staff treating people unprofessionally, please fix this because this location is good, but bad service.
